title: How Netflix Is Still Winning, with Brandon Katz
description: Brandon Katz, senior entertainment reporter for Observer, chats with Nora and Scott about the business of streaming, from the latest “Squid Game” Netflix stats, to the looming threat of HBOMax... and predicts what the end of the streaming wars might look like.
itunes:title: How Netflix Is Still Winning, with Brandon Katz
itunes:author: Morning Brew
itunes:subtitle: For lovers of streaming entertainment (and 'Squid Game'), this is as good as it gets.
itunes:summary: Brandon Katz, senior entertainment reporter for Observer, chats with Nora and Scott about the business of streaming, from the latest “Squid Game” Netflix stats, to the looming threat of HBOMax... and predicts what the end of the streaming wars might look like.
